thread.title: Any Adventure, Any Day is Now Easier to Discover in Redding and Shasta Cascade on the Newly Launched Visit Redding Website

author: cbs8
title: Any Adventure, Any Day is Now Easier to Discover in Redding and Shasta Cascade on the Newly Launched Visit Redding Website
text:
www.VisitRedding.com
Find New Travel Tools, Updated Content, Streaming Video and Mobile Ready Information about CA's Majestic Playground
REDDING, Calif. , Aug. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- According to the Redding Convention and Visitors Bureau, the newly launched www.VisitRedding.com embraces the latest in technology and depicts Redding the way they are fortunate to see it every day: breathtaking. The new website allows the world to get a good look at northern California's regal playground, filled with mountains, lakes, parks and over 200 miles of trails. Now visitors can effortlessly find detailed descriptions on the region's best outdoor adventure experiences, along with spectacular photography capturing Redding's natural beauty.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150820/259896
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150820/259895
"The primary vision of the new site was to paint a picture of what it really looks and feels like being here in Redding , with the purpose of showcasing the breadth of beauty and adventure this area has to offer," explains Laurie Baker , Chief Executive Officer, Redding Convention & Visitors Bureau. "The new site is filled with incredible imagery, a live video stream of the Sundial Bridge and a wealth of adventure ideas to help visitors imagine themselves here, having fun, in our corner of the world."
Redding is the bustling hub city of Shasta Cascade, and its overhauled site shows just how easy it is to start a journey from there into one of America's most spectacular and pristine regional destinations.
New Travel Tools
Thanks to a reorganized sitemap, visitors can easily build travel itineraries around their own personal interests. The Travel Tools section includes refreshed FAQs, expanded maps and directions, a handy travel planner, information about the Visitors Center and a monthly newsletter. Curious onlookers can also watch what's happening on the world famous Sundial Bridge's live feed , offering a controllable view of the weather conditions, the flowing Sacramento River and this magnificent bridge. The new site is mobile friendly and well organized, allowing users to access their choice of activity, dining, lodging or attraction with a minimal amount of clicking.
To discover all Redding has to offer including adventures, attractions and additional information about the many things to do and see in the majestic region of northeastern California , visit www.visitredding.com .
